title: Business Council of Australia
snippet: The Business Council of Australia brings together the experience and capability of chief executives and their teams from across a diverse range of industries to develop common-sense, trusted and evidence-based policies.

title: Business Council of Australia proposes five critical questions for the next Australian government - AICD
snippet: There was a handover from [former BCA president] Tim Reed GAICD to Geoff that was very smooth. It so happens Geoff and Tim actually went to the same school and they seem to have a natural affinity. Tim’s wise, very calm and a delightful human being, and I’m fortunate to have another chair I would describe in the same terms.
